description: The image captures a cozy indoor scene at a café or restaurant. Two teal-colored ceramic cups, one filled with a hot beverage, are placed on a mosaic tiled table. Accompanying the cups are a water glass and two wine glasses, one of which is empty. The ambiance is enhanced by a lit candle, providing a warm glow. In the background, patrons are seated at tables, contributing to a relaxed and intimate atmosphere.
poem:
In a café where the candles glow bright,
Two cups on the table, a delightful sight.
A serene night unfolds in the room,
As conversations bloom under the moon.
In this cozy corner, all feels right.
